page.title: 04SHOPS IN CARTMEL - 1
page.content: {TRADE. SHOPS IN CARTMEL (1) {The Larch Tree.}The Larch Tree has been a gift shop and cafe for 4 years.It sells jewellry,ornaments and children's gifts. Busiesttimes are weekends and weekdays in the summer months. They are open all week except for Wednesday afternoons. {Tarragon.}Tarragon sells herbs, pottery and kitchen ware. The previous owner was an outfitter and sold school uniforms. {Book Shop.}This is the seventh book shop in Cartmel since 1884. Mr Peter Bain-Smith deals mainly with second hand books and prints. He sells about 10 000 books a year. {Report by Helen Evans aged 10. {
